caption.center: CLAUDE THERIAULT, APPELLANT, v. SHERIFF, CLARK COUNTY, NEVADA,

opinion.posture: Appeal from an order denying a pretrial petition for writ of habeas corpus, Eighth Judicial District Court, Clark County; William P. Compton, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Alan R. Johns and Gordon L. Hawkins, of Las Vegas, for Appellant.
Robert List, Attorney General, Carson City; Roy A. Woofter, District Attorney, and Donald K. Wadsworth, Deputy District Attorney, Clark County, for Respondent.
opinion.opinion_text: This appeal is without merit. The order of the trial court is affirmed.Page 507
